short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension shows the time and date in the toolbar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This tiny extension puts a tiny clock *and month/date calendar* in your toolbar!  Perfect for full-screen use of Chrome!

Highly Recommended: 

1) A HiDPI display such as a Retina Mac or Chromebook Pixel 
2) Good vision

-Netchipguy
